subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Stephon Marbury, a two-time N.B.A. All-Star who played for the Knicks and the Nets, has joined Shanxi Zhongyu of the Chinese Basketball Association.
snippet: Stephon Marbury, a two-time N.B.A. All-Star who played for the Knicks and the Nets, has joined Shanxi Zhongyu of the Chinese Basketball Association.
